*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}body{margin:0;font-family:NowieVremena,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;line-height:1.5;color:#2a2a2a;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);-webkit-focus-ring-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,0);-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale}ol,ul{margin:0;padding:0}ol li,ul li{list-style:none}address{font-style:normal}img,video{max-width:100%}img{border:0;vertical-align:top}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p{margin:0}p{font-family:NowieVremena,Arial,sans-serif}p+p{margin-top:30px}a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none}input,textarea{border:none}button,input:focus,textarea:focus{outline:none}button{border:none;color:#fff;font-family:Slab-Bold,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:16px;line-height:1;background:none;transition:transform .3s;cursor:pointer}button:active{transform:translate(2px,2px)}.wrapper{position:relative;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column;-webkit-box-pack:justify;-ms-flex-pack:justify;justify-content:space-between;min-height:100vh;overflow:hidden}.container{width:100%;max-width:1190px;margin:0 auto;padding:0 15px}@media (max-width:730px){.container{padding:0 15px}}.none{display:none}.title{font-size:36px;line-height:normal}._active{transform:translate(0);opacity:1;transition:all .8s ease .4s}.header-page{font-family:NowieVremena,Arial,sans-serif}.header-page__container{padding:15px 40px 0;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}.header-page__start{opacity:0}.header-page__start:hover{color:#fd6c40}.header-page__start._active{transform:translate(0);opacity:1;transition:all .9s ease .4s}.header-page__ul{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;opacity:0}.header-page__ul._active{transform:translate(0);opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease .4s}.header-page__li{font-size:18px;margin-right:35px;transition:.3s ease;cursor:pointer}.header-page__li:last-child{margin-right:0}.header-page__li:hover{color:#fd6c40}.header-page__logo{position:relative;font-family:Slab-Bold,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:20px;cursor:pointer;text-transform:uppercase}.section-top{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-align:center;position:relative;padding:100px 0 45px}.section-top__container{position:relative;width:520px;margin:0}.section-top__title{font-family:Slab-Bold,Arial,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:44px;color:#fd6c40;cursor:pointer;opacity:0;transform:translateY(-30px)}.section-top__title._active{transform:translate(0);opacity:1;transition:all .8s ease .4s}.section-top__info{color:#fd6c40;font-size:18px;transition:.3s #000;border-radius:8px;background-color:#fd6c40;text-transform:uppercase;color:#000;font-size:48px}.banner-left__info.--first{position:absolute;transform:rotate(355deg);top:10px;left:30px}.banner-left__info.--two{position:absolute;top:85px;left:412px}.banner-left__info.--third{position:absolute;transform:rotate(3deg);top:163px;left:-35px}.banner-left__info.--fourth{position:absolute;transform:rotate(358deg);top:258px;left:55px}.banner-right__text{margin-right:145px;text-align:center;color:#fff;font-size:20px}.banner-gif{position:absolute;transform:rotate(90deg);right:95px;top:80px;max-width:300px}
